## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsynchronousKeyValueLoading/load(_:isolation:)] method to retrieve the property value.

The value contains an array of metadata items that contain an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem/identifier] value from the set of Common Metadata Identifiers.

You can filter items in this array according to language by calling [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem/metadataItems(from:filteredAndSortedAccordingToPreferredLanguages:)], or by identifier by calling [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem/metadataItems(from:filteredByIdentifier:)].

# commonMetadata

**Type Property**

The metadata items that an asset contains for common metadata identifiers.

## Declaration

```swift
static var commonMetadata: AVAsyncProperty<Root, [AVMetadataItem]> { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsynchronousKeyValueLoading/load(_:isolation:)] method to retrieve the property value.

The value contains an array of metadata items that contain an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem/identifier] value from the set of Common Metadata Identifiers.

You can filter items in this array according to language by calling [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem/metadataItems(from:filteredAndSortedAccordingToPreferredLanguages:)], or by identifier by calling [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem/metadataItems(from:filteredByIdentifier:)].

## Loading metadata

- **metadata**: The metadata items that an asset contains for all metadata identifiers.
- **availableMetadataFormats**: The formats of metadata that an asset contains.
- **loadMetadata(for:completionHandler:)**: Loads an array of metadata items that the asset contains for the specified format.
- **creationDate**: A metadata item that indicates the creation date of an asset.
- **lyrics**: The lyrics of the asset in a language suitable for the current locale.
